subject: Steroids
Drug Abuse and Traffic
lead_paragraph: It isn’t important if big-time sports names are busted. The main thing is that Tuesday’s raid may have saved the life of somebody’s son, somebody’s brother, who is putting bad stuff into his system.
snippet: It isn’t important if big-time sports names are busted. The main thing is that Tuesday’s raid may have saved the life of somebody’s son, somebody’s brother, who is putting bad stuff into his system.
